articles.author: Caroline De Moraes, Simon Hart
articles.title: Manchester City's Bernardo Silva has lit up the season so far... now he's dreaming of European glory - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE INTERVIEW BY CAROLINE DE MORAES AND SIMON HART: City insiders say the same about Bernardo - a bright and chatty player with a gift for languages and a love of a joke.
articles.content: Bernardo Silva is sitting at the edge of the indoor pitch at Manchester Citys training ground talking about John. The John in question is not John Stones, his City team-mate. Rather, his pet dog. Joh… [+9076 chars]
